name: Smartwool Secret Sleuth No Show Socks - Women's
description: Pssst… these socks are so low-cut, you can wear them with ballet flats.Ultra lightweight with no cushioning to smoothly glide into close-fitting shoes without bunching.Internal grippers at the heels so they stay put.Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear.Narrower profile is designed to fit women's narrower feet.
